content.en: Aneurysm detection: Researchers have been investigating the capabilities of algorithms in assessing and detecting various types of aneurysms. These algorithms, such as computer-assisted detection systems, radiomic models, deep learning algorithms, and machine learning algorithms, are being attributed agency in accurately predicting rupture risk, differentiating between different types of aneurysms, detecting and localizing aneurysms, and assessing aneurysm growth status. The combination of deep learning, morphological characteristics, and radiomic features is also being explored to provide advanced warning of aortic dissection. These studies highlight the potential of algorithms in improving the diagnosis and management of aneurysms.
content.da: Aneurisme-detektion: Forskere har undersøgt mulighederne for algoritmer til at vurdere og detektere forskellige typer aneurismer. Disse algoritmer, såsom computerassisterede detektionssystemer, radiomiske modeller, dybdelæringsalgoritmer og maskinlæringsalgoritmer, tilskrives evnen til præcist at forudsige rupturrisiko, skelne mellem forskellige typer aneurismer, detektere og lokalisere aneurismer samt vurdere vækstatus for aneurismer. Kombinationen af dybdelæring, morfologiske karakteristika og radiomiske træk bliver også undersøgt for at give en avanceret advarsel om aortadissektion. Disse studier fremhæver potentialet af algoritmer i at forbedre diagnosticeringen og håndteringen af aneurismer.
